name: TABLA WINTER PARK

about.headline: Tabla Indian Restaurant Winter Park
about.subHeadline: Tabla Indian Restaurant Winter Park, an authentic Indian diner in the city!
content: Tabla Restaurant, Park Avenue in Winter Park, is a go-to destination for lovers of Indian cuisine. Tabla featuring Indian, Indian-Chinese, and Thai cuisine has taken the traditional recipes and enhanced them with a modern approach.

This is the perfect place to reserve for your next special meal, with a fascinating ambiance, new interpretations, and amazing flavor combinations! Tabla's success can be attributed to superb food prepared by enthusiastic chefs. Tabla has taken traditional recipes and improved them with a modern twist over the years. Everything on their menu is capable of pleasing your taste buds.

extraInfo: The staff is friendly, smart, and super active. Being polite and kind, the staff are available at your service all the time. Tabla Restaurant has 50+ specialized dishes on its menu if you're seeking an authentic Indian fine dining experience. The traditional Indian restaurant focuses on ambience and authenticity, customer service, and world-class cuisine, with alternatives to suit every taste and occasion.

meta.description: Tabla Indian Restaurant Winter Park partner with Stealth management group is the most authentic Indian diner in the city.
meta.title: Tabla Indian Restaurant Winter Park
